title: Lost in Space – The Captain's Isolation
narrative_alignment: Isolation, survival, existential dread, cosmic anomaly

setting.visual_mood: Minimalist, cold, haunting, with bursts of cosmic wonder

gameplay_hooks: Decode alien glyphs on a drifting monolith
Survive a plasma anomaly without full ship control

script_copy.description: Dim lighting. The hum of the ship is constant, low, and haunting. A solitary figure lies in a bunk, wrapped in a thick blanket.
dialogue: CAPTAIN (V.O.): It's so dark and so lonely.
CAPTAIN (V.O.): The cold fast... chills me every time I awake and realize where I am.
CAPTAIN (V.O.): It's been 18 years. I'm blessed with supplies to continue. Or I'm cursed with not being able to take mercy on myself.
CAPTAIN (V.O.): The AI has lost context to be anything of use for a decade now... has it been a decade?

script_copy.description: A cavernous dining space. The Captain sits alone at a long table, eating mechanically. The silence is oppressive.
dialogue: SHIP'S ASSISTANT (O.S.): You gotta get up here!
actions: Lights flicker—blackout—then flash into RED ALERT mode

script_copy.description: A full silent beat. Then: ALARMS. BUZZERS. The Captain stumbles out of the mess hall, running.
dialogue: SHIP'S ASSISTANT (O.S.): It's... fluorescent light. Almost like a phasma... plasma... signature inc—
SHIP'S ASSISTANT (O.S.): Get the fuck up here!! I can't do this by myself!!
actions: The Captain is violently THROWN against the corridor wall

script_copy.description: The Captain bursts in, blanket trailing behind him. He stumbles to the helm.

title: The Mogul's Ascent

locations: VTOL landing pads and media-saturated streets
setting.visual_mood: Gritty glamor, cybernetic augmentation, psychedelic overlays

gameplay_hooks: Broker a hostile takeover of a biotech firm
Survive a scandal leaked by a rival
Navigate a hallucination-induced crisis at a public event

script_copy.description: Towering vertical windows frame a sprawling cityscape—steaming neon veins, layered smog, and endless motion.
dialogue: MOGUL (unties bowtie): I get so tired of this.
MOGUL (slumps into chair, cigarette dangling): They all want something.
actions: Throws back two fingers of scotch

script_copy.description: A quad-jet VTOL descends. The Mogul steps out from the back seat—white tux shirt rolled to the elbows, ballcap pulled low.
actions: CAMERA ZOOMS OUT into the air
Lines and paparazzi fade into the city

script_copy.description: Booth corner party. A hot alien leans in. The Mogul is hallucinating as punk rock music blares.
audio: Punk rock overtaken by guitar amp feedback
visuals: Alien face fractures into kaleidoscope shards
script_copy.transition: PSYCHEDELIC FADE OUT → CUT TO BLACK
